item.title: UBS Completes Historic Takeover as Credit Suisse Ends
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- UBS Group AG completed the historic acquisition of its former rival Credit Suisse, marking a new chapter for the Swiss financial sector as the defunct bank’s legal existence has formally ended. “Today, Credit Suisse AG has been deregistered in the Commercial Register of the Canton of ...

item.title: Euro-Zone Inflation Up More Than Expected Before ECB Cut
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- Euro-area inflation accelerated more than anticipated — further clouding the outlook for European Central Bank interest rates after next week’s planned cut. Consumer prices rose 2.6% from a year ago in May, up from 2.4% in April, Eurostat said Friday. That’s more than the 2.5% median ...

item.title: Panetta Says ECB Cuts Now Avoid ‘Tardy and Hasty’ Action Later
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- The European Central Bank shouldn’t delay interest-rate cuts because doing so can just end up forcing more drastic action at a later stage, Governing Council member Fabio Panetta said. Delivering his first annual speech in Rome, the Bank of Italy governor signaled that a steady descen...

item.title: Early Election Adds to Bull Case for London Markets This Year
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- UK assets have mostly traded sideways since the announcement of the July 4 election, but that hasn’t stopped market participants from becoming more positive, with the opposition Labour Party far ahead in the polls. With London-listed stocks hovering near record highs and the pound hol...

item.title: Zeichen einer vergangenen Zeit

item.description: Keine Frage, die Aussicht ist eine Wucht. Wie weit der Blick reicht aus dem 20., 30., oder gar 40. Stock so eines Wolkenkratzers. item.title: Die Generation Z investiert
item.author: TAGESSPIEGEL
item.description: Mit Schlaghose oder Baggy Pants und einer kleinen Sonnenbrille auf der Nase: Die Gen Z der zwischen 1995 und 2010 Geborenen – zumindest in meinem näheren Umfeld – mag es kleidungstechnisch eher schluffig.
